message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  Would you be willing to go down to $10,500?  I think that's a fair price for both of us.
Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, but I was really hoping to get a bit more for the product. I can meet you in the middle at $11,250. Would that work for you?
